Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, it holds an intrinsic value of $15000 to me. I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $12500. This offer includes comprehensive support and a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
